article: Brian is my good friend. He has a five-year-old daughter, Lydia. Lydia likes animals very much and always  _  to have a dog. This Sunday is Lydia's birthday. Brian wants to buy  _  a dog. So he goes to the  pet store  near his home. He says hello to Paul, the owner of the store. Paul says hello to him, too. Brian says, "This is a clean and  _  pet store." Then he walks around the store.  _  he doesn't see any pets. "Excuse me.  _  are the pets?" he asks. "The pets are right here," says Paul. Then Paul  _  him a catalog . Brian sees  _  pictures of pets in it, like dogs, cats and birds. "You only need to  _  me the pet you like," says Paul. "We can mail it to you." "What if I don't like it?" asks Brian. "  _  mail it back," says Paul. "Oh, sounds interesting," says Brian.
